title: Skipped 2 Week Ban For Permaban????
body:
JUST TO CLARIFY THIS BAN HAPPENED LIKE 7 MONTHS AGO. I JUST NOW DECIDED TO SEE IF I COULD GET THE ACCOUNT BACK AND IF THE COMMUNITY SUPPORTED MY OPINION. FROM WHAT I HAVE SEEN, I HAVE A FAIRLY UNPOPULAR OPINION REGARDING WHETHER I WAS DESERVING OF THIS BAN, SO THANK YOU EVERYONE FOR THE INPUT! I NOW BELIEVE THAT I WAS TRULY DESERVING OF THIS BAN.
Hey guys, basically I want your opinions on this. I had a game where I was a pretty toxic jerk to be honest. I wouldn't have argued a 2 week suspension (in fact I would have defended it), but do you guys really think this deserved a straight permanent ban? (LET ME MAKE IT VERY CLEAR that I AM NOT defending this behavior, I am simply arguing it warranted a 2-week suspension, not a permanent ban). 
Also, note that I think the highest punishment my account had received prior to this was a 5 game chat suspension quite a few months before this happened. _**Riot Tantram plz notice me senpai.**_

Overall just verbally abusive. Abusive enough for permanent ban? Mm, yeah. Personally would never like to meet you.

I don't afk, I (USED TO) just run my mouth and dig my hole deeper and deeper (It's a problem that I used to have. Now I just /mute all and typically don't talk in chat anymore). Thanks for the input! Thanks again for providing your input, and I'm sorry if you were offended by what I said. I really do regret it. Have a nice day :)
